Articles.Content:
I'm so excited to hear about a new Oddworld. This game looks awesome and reminds me of my childhood.

http://www.oddworld.com/oddworldgames/new-n-tasty/

Check it out and feel free to share your opinions.

Hmm, a remake of Abe's Odysee? Looks good. I never finished either Odysee or Exodus, but when I last played Exodus, I was quite far in and in a tricky situation.

Good games, they be. Hard, but good.
